description: Completely worthless garbage

App works as advertised, I really like it and find it pretty convenient. Only drawback is the indicator icon is a generic electron one, not the icon for the app. In the process of trying to figure out how to change this.
A very amazing free app that works with protonmail and tutanota. I am very impressed with this app. Everyone should give this a TRY!
A fairly decent protonmail wrapper. The sign in process could be streamlined a little to provide a better user experience
I'm using it with a tutanota and a protonmail account and both work well without any problems!

The app is only limited to electron mail and one more mail provider. It does not yet support the most providers like google/yahoo/msn/etc.
The feel and look is quiet nice though.
I would love to see more developers doing fantastic projects like this to help the community. Bravo.

Real Easy to set up, a bit more prompting could help others... 

de G7OOE (John)
Allows many Protonmail plus features for free, like email export, full text search and auto-login.

great app when i can login. it trys to auto login with that not being setup. tries 5 times before it gives up. i have two factor on. so the app tries to use the old code not the new one. need this to be fixed.
Looks nice, loads fine with torsocks, but there's a lack of /proxifying/ options.
Works with my Ubuntu 20.04 LTS.
software simply does not run as a snap... no idea why... no feedback.
summary: The app does not launch on PoP os 20.04

description: I have been looking for something like this. The official Protonmail bridge is paid, so this is pretty much the only free option for a Protonmail desktop app.
summary: Been looking for something like this

description: A program is not very useful if it dies not even start. I thought the purpose of snaps was that they could run averywhere? The target system is the latest Ubuntu. This developer needs to do some basic testing i think. Maybe i have an old config, but that should not matter. If a config dies not work, then start over.
The snap installation produces "Unhandled Promise Rejection" errors and the deb installation freezes up ever minute. Unfortunately the new update is not usable for me.

I love the app, it's very nice. One thing I can resolve though is that it prompts to trust GPG keys with every new signed message. The keys are in the system, and show up as trusted, but it still prompts to trust every time.
Generally I liked the app, but it stopped working (does not launch). Please fix it and I will give it 5 *. Running it on xubuntu.

+ Looks sleek
+ Multi-Accounts
+ 2FA Accounts supported

In one word: Love it
summary: Amazing, highly recommended for all users of ProtonMail

description: I have spent nearly a month looking at different email clients and tried out Geary, Evolution, Thunderbird, Hiri, Mailspring etc. All of them had issues with Proton Mail. I then found Electron Mail and it is absolutely fantastic and very professional. Will be supporting this app in anyway I can!
summary: It was surprisingly difficult to find a decent email client

description: Works pretty fine

Works fine as a web app in a window. It only works for mail and calendar though and NOT the new stuff from protonmail: ProtonVPN and ProtonDrive. You cannot activate wither in this interface. But they are in the UI... which is confusing. Please fix this bug.
I have recently switched from Win10 to Ubuntu and tried this program on the new platform, works perfectly, nothing to complain about.
worked for a few days and seemed great but now it just logs itself out after 2 seconds
prob only unofficial client for protonmail?
summary: seems to work well for me

description: Works very nicely but it crashes when you try to select a file system directory to export emails to - Kubuntu 21.04, KDE Plasma Version 5.21.4

I really liked this app. I prefered using it over the browser. And I can ignore the generic icon, and that I have to right-click and toggle to open the app. But the app seems to use 99-100% of one of my CPU cores at all time. I'll install it again if this is fixed in the future. 

OS: Ubuntu 20.04.3 LTS
Kernel: 5.11.0-40-generic
DE: Plasma
summary: Would be great, if not for the CPU core hogging

description:
Seems to be in line with another review here that indicated that it's using 99-100% of CPU time. 

Used to work a lot quieter before... what happened?
summary: Had to uninstall - made CPU fan go constantly

description: Works great, cutting down on time to log into ProtonMail (but you'd still need to type system password)
This app is really a must-have if you're using Protonmail.
"human check" with an empty page.
Best protonmail client
its very good !

This app seems to be basically embedding the protonmail web interface, but in a heavyweight electron application with a sandboxed chrome. It doesn't seem to offer any extra functionality over the web site.
summary: no added value over protonmail web site

description: Just as it states - a web embedded ProtonMail interface
summary: Does just as I require it to, removes clutter

description: La aplicación funciona bastante bien y es bastante segura.

-Usando en Ubuntu 21.10. funcionamiento perfecto. Incluye calendario,contactos, y algunas aplicaciones Proton como VPN..
-Incluir el correo es sumamente sencillo, muy recomendable.
Excellente initiative pour utiliser Protonmail et Tutanota SANS navigateur internet.

Impossible de tester l'application, l'application fige et ne se lance pas. Mais, l'initiative est bonne et Protonmail est surement le meilleurs service de courriel que j'ai et c'est pratique de ne pas avoir a se connecter continuellement au webmail. Je met 2 étoiles, je changerai si jamais l'application décide de fonctionner,
Fait entièrement son boulot, en proposant même de rester logué, c'est une très bonne application !

Fonctionne normalement. En cas de mot de passe unique (connexion et boîte mail), laisser la boîte vide.
Works fine. In case of a unique password, let empty the second password field.

J'utilisais la version web et la version ProtonmailBridge pour l'ouvrir dans Thunderbird. Maintenant que j'ai découvert ElectronMail, je suis plus que comblé avec 3 outils de messageries. Merci aux programmeurs....
summary: Application géniale, conviviale, que je recommande

description: Je l'ai cependant désinstallée car elle ne contient aucun dictionnaire français. Je continue avec ProtonMail pour le web, qui utilise le dictionnaire de mon navigateur.
То, что нужно! Огромное спасибо разработчикам!
